name: Spaceship Havoc
description:
The game is currently not available.


Spaceship Havoc is a small arcade game about shooting spaceship.

Enjoy fast, 2d, space dogfight, avoid the drones and other spaceship and try to kill as many of them as possible !

It a small agilty and reflex based challenge made in three weeks. I sharred the game developpement at http://sajgc.tumblr.com/

Spaceship Havoc is available on all major OS. Gamepad is recomanded but you can play with your keyboard.

Thank you!

Update 1
  • 3 new Spaceships types including "The laser gun" and the "Vlambeer machine gun"
  • HighScores (at least)
  • Several bug fixes and improvements
  • Auto Updater
